Class aggregate

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--java.awt.Panel

                    +--java.applet.Applet
                          |
                          +--aggregate
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, BufferedPlotListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, MotePacketListener, java.io.Serializable
public class aggregate
extends java.applet.Applet
implements MotePacketListener, BufferedPlotListener

aggregate opens a serial port for mote packets, creates a grid for maintaining mote readings, processes packets, and aggregates reported sensor reading to a weighted center of mass.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

receive_packet

public void receive_packet(MotePacket packet)
Called when a complete mote packet is received -- this is where the object position is calculated and filtered. Accepts and decodes only measurement packets from motes that fall within the mote grid. Calculates the object position and requests the BufferedPlot to repaint itself.
Specified by:
receive_packet in interface MotePacketListener
Parameters:
packet - the complete mote packet
